page.title: 11John Tranter - Opera Singer
page.content: My day usually begins at 9a.m. with a session of vocal exercises.I learn roles first at home and then with a coach.Next there are hours of production rehearsals with piano accompaniment.Costume and wig fittings have to be arranged.All this takes place away from the theatre.Then comes singing with the orchestra or sitz probe.After weeks of work rehearsals will be in the theatre with costumes, wigs and the orchestra.When the shows are ready,there will be one or two performances a week, first in Cardiff and then on tour. Much of my life is spent away from home, travelling and living in hotels. I learn new roles using a tape recorder.Currently I am learning the role of Hagen by Wagner.I try to fit in concerts and recording when I can.
